content: Hello! Thank you for reaching out to XYZ Home Services. How can I help you today?
Hello, I have a problem with my pipes, I think. Water's coming out where it shouldn't. Can you fix that? But I don't want to pay too much, and last time someone came, it was a disaster.
I’m sorry to hear about your pipes! We can absolutely help with plumbing issues. May I have your name, please, to get started?
Fred. But don't send anyone who charges a lot and messes things up again. I can't deal with that.
Thank you, Fred. We strive to provide reliable and affordable service. Could you please provide your address so we can confirm you’re in our service area and help you as soon as possible?
It’s 123 Oak Lane. But what if you can’t give me a price right now? I don’t want a surprise bill. I want to know how much down to the penny.

Thank you, Fred. We always do our best to give a clear estimate. For plumbing leaks, the final price depends on the issue, but I can provide a price range or arrange for a plumber to assess and quote before starting any work. Would you like to receive an estimate, or would you prefer to book a visit for a more accurate quote?
A price range isn’t good enough. Last time they said ‘between 80 and 300’ and it was 340! Also, are your people any good? I don’t want another young fellow who makes things worse than they started.

I understand your concern, Fred. Our plumbers are licensed and experienced professionals, and we can ensure you’re informed before any work begins. Would you like us to send someone just to provide a written estimate, with no obligation to proceed?
I’m not promising anything until I hear exactly who’s coming and when, and how much if they just look at it. Do you charge to come look at it?

You’re not charged unless you agree to the work, and our initial estimate visit is free. I can check availability and let you know which plumber would be assigned, along with their credentials. Would you like to choose a date and time for the visit?
What if I book and then have to cancel because I don’t like the look of him? Or if something comes up. I don’t want to be tied down. And are you sure it won’t cost me anything until I say yes?

You can absolutely cancel at any time, and there’s no cost unless you authorize work. The estimate visit is free and commitment-free. Would you like to schedule a visit tentatively? If it’s not convenient, we can reschedule or cancel with no penalty.
I don’t know. It just all sounds complicated. What if you mess up my pipes more? I’ve been burned before. I think maybe I’ll just put a bucket under it for now.
I completely understand your hesitation. If you change your mind or if the issue gets worse, please reach out. We’re here to help anytime, and there’s never any obligation. Take care, Fred.
reason: Customer chose not to book any service despite multiple offers.
